modShortDescription: A 7 Days to Die mod that keeps the Torch and Candle blocks from generating heat.
modDescription:
A 7 Days to Die mod that keeps the [Torch and Candle](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-lights/) blocks from generating heat.

**[Download](https://github.com/OdettaMod/Odetta/archive/master.zip)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/14944-no-heat-torchescandles/).

**Credits:** Odetta
